elements.expression:
! ((orders[user][hash] || ecrecover(bytes32,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)(sha3()(Ethereum Signed Message:
32,hash),v,r,s) == user) && block.number <= expires && safeAdd(orderFills[user][hash],amount) <= amountGet)
